tier.item: (14) a. aDi tu=dirus-i na gung kan walegan
N$G G$N:3S=bathe-TR1/2:N$G NOM ox OBL:S Walegan
(14) a. aDi tu=dirus-i na gung kan walegan
N$G G$N:3S=bathe-TR1/2:N$G NOM ox OBL:S Walegan
aDi tu=dirus-i na gung kan walegan
N$G G$N:3S=bathe-TR1/2:N$G NOM ox OBL:S Walegan
`We have not been bitten by snakes.' (Egerod 1966: 354)
`We have not been bitten by snakes.' (Egerod 1966: 354)
We have not been bitten by snakes.
You must not forget my message.
